org.kepler.util

Class FileUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.kepler.util.FileUtil

  • public class FileUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    A place to keep some useful file processing static utility methods.
    Author:
    Aaron Schultz

        public static void copyDirectory(java.io.File sourceLocation,
                                 java.io.File targetLocation,
                                 boolean overwrite)
                          throws java.io.IOException
        Copy a file or directory to another. If the source is a directory, the contents are recursively copied.
        Parameters:
        sourceLocation - the source
        targetLocation - the destination
        overwrite - If true, overwrite files in the targetLocation
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
